sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) The character may suffer a number of strain to add an equal number of successes to any Vigilance or Cool checks to determine Initiative order. The number may not exceed his ranks in Rapid Reaction.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Rapid reaction</name> <number>TAL0001109</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 04:37:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>69cae0b8db624c542901de90cf9619e6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 04:37:44</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
